name: islamic-center-charity-association

scripts.build: echo 'No build process required - static site'
scripts.create-zip: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const archiver=require('archiver');const output=fs.createWriteStream('jamiyati-app-portable.zip');const archive=archiver('zip',{zlib:{level:9}});output.on('close',()=>console.log('Package created: jamiyati-app-portable.zip ('+archive.pointer()+' bytes)'));archive.on('error',err=>{throw err;});archive.pipe(output);archive.directory('frontend/','');archive.directory('scripts/','scripts/');archive.file('README.md',{name:'README.md'});archive.finalize();"
